details:
adjective
- inhabiting or frequenting trees
= example: inhabiting or frequenting trees
= synonyms: arboreous, tree-living
- resembling a tree in form and branching structure
= synonyms: arboreous, arborescent, arboresque, arboriform, dendriform, dendroid, dendroidal, treelike, tree-shaped
- of or relating to or formed by trees
= synonyms: arborical, arborary, arborous
